projects.name: Rubik's Cube Solver
projects.description: Implemented a Rubik's Cube Solving Algorithm applying Kociemba's Two-Step process. For implementation in Purdue ARC Club's Rubik's Cube Solver.

projects.name: Memory Chess
projects.description: Created a chess memory game to run on a Raspberry Pi handheld through the browser. Implemented my engine using WebAssembly within ReactJS

projects.name: Chess Engine
projects.description: Researched and implemented various algorithmic strategies, including bitwise representation and manipulation, alpha-beta pruning, move ordering, transposition tables, etc to create a chess engine. Additionally, I coded a Windows application memory game with the engine using wxWidgets

projects.name: HSE Safety
projects.description: Collaborated with school administration to plan and create a system for staff to quickly and securely access critical safety data. Involved creating a navigation system for a PDF, drill info extraction and room searching, and contact searching
projects.tools: ReactJS, MongoDB, Express.Js, Node.Js, Ant Design, React-PDF

projects.name: HSE Courses
projects.description: Developed a MERN web application to enhance students course planning, reduce course guide maintenance, and improve course offering and diploma requirement awareness. Students can search for courses with variety of feilds, add courses to a four-year plan, and see statistics on their selections whereas counselors can easily update diploma and course data and view student plans and notes
projects.tools: ReactJS, MongoDB, Express.Js, Node.Js, Ant Design
